lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: Eliminating poverty is important to me because all people should have enough money to eat, have shelter and clothing, and take care of their children.  We don't have a lot of extra money, but it is important to me to share our money with others who lack basic necessities or are struggling mightily.  We are a Christian family and it is part of God's call to share with others.  It is an honor to participate in Kiva, and I wish I could do more!
lenders.occupational_info: I was the Admissions Director at a school for over 15 years (young kindergarten-high school), and worked as a university administrator before that at the University of Southern California.  I am now retired.  My husband, Michael, and I have two college aged children -- Thomas and Kathryn (twins).  Each of us are Kiva subscribers.  I have multiple sclerosis (M.S.), and I use an electric wheelchair to go long distances.  I can walk short distances using a cane or walker.  I have been, and am very blessed!  The Lord is always faithful and provides for all our needs.

I will despair, that I do not know what to do and ask for your help maybe you can help Thank you very much
God Blesses You.

lenders.occupational_info: جواب كم — على — باب كم | أول موقع عربي يهتم بالإجابة عن كل الأسئلة التي تبدأ بــــ كيف

lenders.name: Temo
lenders.loan_because: I want to give access to funding to the people and spare them from local banks who would not lend without receiving a huge collateral and/or charging draconic interest rates.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I love.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Student studying to a be a speech therapist to help people with language and communication disorders.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: my boss rewards my work with gift certificates to KIVA. I have also purchased gift certificates as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize a four person office including scheduling, case processing and client service.

lenders.name: Reece
lenders.loan_because: It is a step in the right direction. Let's start a lending revolution!!
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a campaign manager for a large media organisation. I'm also completing my Masters in Social Development and am quietly confident that Kiva may be the sustainable alternative to charity that we have been searching for!!

lenders.name: Nikki
lenders.loan_because: me gusta ayudar a la gente.  Somos hermanos y hermanas en Dios.
lenders.occupational_info: Trabajo como maestra de español a una escuela privada catolica de todos hombres.

lenders.name: June
lenders.loan_because: I want to help to empower people who are less fortunate than me.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way for those of us who live a life of abundance to help those in need.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.  Everyone residing on Planet Earth is in a way my neighbor.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage Woodlocke Apartments in Moncks Corner, South Carolina, USA.  This job is rewarding as I am given an opportunity to assist others with their housing needs.

lenders.name: Douglas/Laura
lenders.loan_because: It's a great addition to charity giving.
lenders.occupational_info: Due to an injury I'm wheelchair bound.  I do some non-paid work for our neighborhood association.  My wife tracks diseases for our state health department.
